FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.GenericErrorBody: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.ConnectionError: An error occurred while connecting to Epic servers. Please try again later.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.InitializationErro: An error occurred while initializing. Please try again later.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.NeedsUpdateMessage: An update is required to continue. Please restart Fortnite to download the latest patch.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.ManifestArchiveErr: Failed to write necessary files. Please try again later.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.NoInternetError: No internet connection detected. Please check your connection and try again.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.NeedsUpdateMessageMobileAndroid: The latest version of Fortnite is required to play.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.NeedsUpdateMessageMobileIOS: The latest version of Fortnite is required to play.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.DiskSpaceWarningBo:
There is not enough space on your device.
{RequiredBytes} is required.
{AvailableBytes} is available.
You need an additional {SpaceAdditional} to perform the installation.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.DiskSpaceBackgroun:
There is not enough space on your device.
{RequiredBytes} is required.
{AvailableBytes} is available.
You need an additional {SpaceAdditional} to perform the installation. 
Or an additional {BackSpaceAdditional} to perform Background Download
FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.SuggestedOSUpdateW: We recommend updating to the latest OS to improve your Fortnite experience.
FortnitePreLoadScreen.FortnitePreLoadScreen.CellularDataWarnin: You are about to use cellular data to download Fortnite content. This will require downloading approximately {DownloadSizeEstimate}.

FortniteShaderCompileScreen.FortniteShaderCompileScreen.GPUDriverErr: Unfortunately Fortnite encountered an error indicating an incompatibility with your mobile device's graphics driver."If this problem persists we recommend you install any available System Updates for your device.
FortniteShaderCompileScreen.FortniteShaderCompileScreen.FailedToStor: Unfortunately Fortnite encountered an error while attempting to save the optimized content to your device."If this problem persists we recommend you try freeing up storage space on your device.

GenericDeviceNotSupported.NotEnoughSpecs: This device is not officially supported by Fortnite. You may experience reduced game performance and stability when playing on this device.

GenericPlatformMemory.NotEnoughMemoryForDevice: We're sorry. Fortnite requires a device with 2GB of memory to run.

IOSPlatformMemory.NotEnoughMemoryForDevice: Sorry, this device can’t run Fortnite because it doesn’t meet the necessary hardware requirements.

PreLoadScreenWidget.EarlyStartupPatcher.DefaultErrorBody: An Unknown Error has occured. Please try again later.
PreLoadScreenWidget.EarlyStartupPatcher.NotificationsPermiss: Get notifications for content downloads, friend and party invites, new seasons, limited time events, announcements and promotions. Configure these settings at any time.
Get notified about friend and party invites, new seasons, limited time events, announcements and promotions. Configure these at any time in Fortnite Settings.
PreLoadScreenWidget.EarlyStartupPatcher.NotificationsSetting:
Get notified when your download is complete, along with party invites and game updates.

Turn on notifications from your device's Fortnite settings.
PreLoadScreenWidget.FortniteEarlyStartupPatcher.AppCanBeMini: No need to wait around. The download will continue in the background, and we'll notify you when it's time to finish up.
No need to wait around. The download will continue in the background. Be sure to check back soon to finish up.
PreLoadScreenWidget.FortniteEarlyStartupPatcher.AppMustBeInF: Please keep Fortnite open for the update to complete.
PreLoadScreenWidget.EarlyStartupPatcher.NotificationsPermiss:
Your Fortnite download is in progress, but it doesn't mean you have to wait around.

Turn on notifications to know when your download has completed.
